entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:32 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 09:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: NNE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 08:26 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 08:26 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:26 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
